top_themes: Hints of support and bullish positioning
Political discontent and protests over cocoa price levels in Ghana
Mixed farmer opinions on price fairness

query_results.top_post: It's been a while since I saw cocoa futures under $ 3 000/ton. Last time prices were around these levels was May 2016. There's so much to do to in Cote d'Ivoire & Ghana to readjust the sector to prices this low - nearly a quarter of where they were in May 2025 ($ 8,656)
"Breaking 🚨 : The NPP is mobilising for a major demonstration in the Ashanti Region over the current cocoa prices." (Bearish local sentiment)
